overview: CIO TALK RADIO:- With a mission to inform, educate, and connect global IT leaders, CIO Talk Radio (http://www.CIOtalkradio.com) is the only technology talk show directly tackling the range of strategic issues facing today’s IT leader. Heard each week over Internet based radio, the show brings together top practitioners, experts, and analysts from around the globe to share their views and insights. These off-the-cuff conversations offer listene rs practical wisdom from the most trustworthy source, their fellow practitioners and thought leaders. Whether caught live show or on-demand, these probing discussions are guaranteed to offer business and technology professionals a deeper understanding of the trends and technologies that are shaping the future of business and the IT that business depends on.
